body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Car Solutions. My name is Terry Price. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Catherine. Could you please spell out your street address for me?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's four five six Main Street.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, and could you also provide me with the last four digits of your telephone number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it's eight two three zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Catherine. That's all the information I need for now. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, Terry. I'm feeling happy with the service I received.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm glad to hear that, Catherine. Thank you for your time. Have a wonderful day!

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Car Solutions. My name is Terry Price. May I have your name, please?
